author: tjitse
title: NFTs for a better world
description: NFT technology enables new ways to empower people to contribute to a better world. But most projects focus solely on visual development
solution: Using NFTs to share growth and sustainability-oriented content while facilitating a platform and community network for others to do the same
experience: The team contains growth and sustainability content creators, a network specialist (MSc) and a Cardano developer (first plutus cohort)
